Title: Public trial of evil tyrant
Publisher: Shanghai da jie lu sanbasan long si ling hao huadong shudian (上海大洁路三八三弄四〇號華東書店)
Notes: A landlord put on stage for a 'criticism meeting' with peasants, under the supervision of PLA soldiers.The meaning of the text on the banner above the stage is not entirely clear:公審惡霸牛闫王大曰 (Gongshen eba niu yan wang da yue)The big day of the public trial of the evil tyrant ox-demon-king?The big day of the public trial of the evil tyrant and cruel Niu?
